nodes.description: Breivik于2011年7月25日发布1500页宣言，提出区分文化基督教与宗教基督教
nodes.support_text: July 25, 2011 12:37 AM EDT Anders Behring Breivik placed himself potentially outside of religious Christianity in a 1,500 page manifesto he has reportedly admitted to writing.

nodes.description: 宣言明确表示 Breivik及部分群体认同基督教作为文化、社会及道德框架，但无个人宗教信仰
nodes.support_text: A majority of so called agnostics and atheists in Europe are cultural conservative Christians without even knowing it. If you have a personal relationship with Jesus Christ and God then you are a religious Christian.

nodes.description: Breivik在宣言中解释其自我定位为非宗教基督徒，强调受世俗环境与实用主义影响
nodes.support_text: I'm not going to pretend I'm a very religious person as that would be a lie. I've always been very pragmatic and influenced by my secular surroundings and environment.

nodes.description: Breivik在宣言中为其'殉教行动'进行辩护
nodes.support_text: Later in the manifesto, when attempting to justify his 'martyrdom operation' Breivik did not see himself as being religious

edges.support_text: Later in the manifesto, when attempting to justify his 'martyrdom operation' Breivik did not see himself as being religious
宣言发布后，Breivik开始系统化为其'殉教行动'辩护
